title: Positive and exciting movie for the pre-schoolers.
review:
I can only quote my four year old son that watches Fireman Sam alot. As we walked out of the cinema he said this was the best Fireman Sam he had watched. My son was sitting on the edge of his seat for the better half of this movie.

One hour of almost constant action and lots og focus on proper safety procedures for a whole bunch of different scenarios.
